note: Oie, pra quem não me conhece, me chamo Danielle, sou brasileira, moradora de Canoas/ Bairro Mathias Velho o qual foi atingido por uma enchente, devido às fortes chuvas no Rio Grande do Sul.

I'm computer science and neuroscience, raised by the seas of southeast asia. I play billiards too.

Iloilo, 🇵🇭🇯🇵

Former appellate defender and UC Berkeley Law graduate. My practice was limited to representing indigents on appeal.

I’ve written more than a dozen books and published more than 50 short pieces in The Washington Post, Cnn.com, and others. My book prizes include the Jane Addams Book Award.
